title: On-street Carshare Parking
description: A. SUMMARY This dataset was first created as part of the SFMTA On Street Car Share Pilot Program (approved by the MTA Board in July 2013) to illustrate the location of implemented and planned (various stages) spaces throughout the city. B. METHODOLOGY The locations were originally provided to the MTA as requests by the three car share organizations (CSOs). These were given as a .kml file, which was converted to a .shp. Additional fields were created using spatial joins (zipcode, supervisor district, CNN, etc). Use definition query tool to display those locations with a certain attribute. For example, query Existing = 1 to display those locations that are on street operating. 500 submissions were given by CSOs to the MTA, but only a portion of those were brought to the MTA Board for approval, and even fewer were implemented as operational on street spaces. With no definition query, you can see all spaces as features, with varying levels of data completion. C. UPDATE FREQUENCY During periods of implementation/construction, updates were as frequent as daily or weekly. However, as the frequency of newly implemented spaces slowed over the course of the pilot, updates occurred less frequently--weekly or monthly. Updates will be needed as new spaces are implemented--many of the spaces not taken past MTA Board approval have incomplete data. D. OTHER CRITICAL INFO Each feature (or each row, or point) represents a single car share parking space. Some parking spaces belong to a "pod" where there are two adjacent car share parking spaces, indicated by the "PodType" field. To summarize or analyze by pod, use the "POD" field.

columns.name: OBJECTID
columns.description: Automatic unique identifier created by system

columns.name: SPACEID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the on-street car sharing space (refers to the CSO and location of the space request, where City CarShare begins with C; Getaround with G; Zipcar with Z. All numbers are three digits)

columns.name: INFO
columns.description: Space request submission provided by CSOs. (space requests with a public hearing date have descriptions written under the public hearing structure, space requests without a public hearing date still have either general descriptions or no description yet provided by the CSOs)

columns.name: POD
columns.description: The address with the number of spaces in the pod (either (2), or " ", for one car pods)

columns.name: SPACE_TYPE
columns.description: Indicates whether the space is metered or unmetered

columns.name: CSO
columns.description: Specifies which CSO requested the space--either City CarShare, Getaround or Zipcar

columns.name: DATESUBMIT
columns.description: Date of space request submission

columns.name: DATEMODIFY
columns.description: Date of modification

columns.name: EXISTING
columns.description: Notes whether the space request is existing and in operation (0- not existing, 1- existing)

columns.name: CONFLICT
columns.description: Indicates a conflict

columns.name: FLAG_NOTE
columns.description: A note about conflict or other note

columns.name: POINT_X
columns.description: longitude

columns.name: POINT_Y
columns.description: latitude

columns.name: ST_NAME
columns.description: Name of street

columns.name: ST_TYPE
columns.description: Street type

columns.name: STREETNAME
columns.description: Street name and street type

columns.name: ADDRANGE
columns.description: Indicates the address range of the street segment on which the space is located

columns.name: POST_ID
columns.description: If the space is metered, indicates the meter post ID

columns.name: PH_DATE
columns.description: Date of public hearing for space

columns.name: TASC_DATE
columns.description: Date the space went to TASC

columns.name: MTAB_DATE
columns.description: Date the space was heard by the MTA Board

columns.name: APPROVAL
columns.description: Indicates approval by MTA Board or not (" ")

columns.name: WO_LOG_NO
columns.description: Indicates the shop crew work order log number (this number is attached to the work order sent to the sign. meter, paint shops necessary for constructing/installing the space)

columns.name: WO_ROUND
columns.description: Work orders for spaces were sent to shops in batches (this number indicates which work order set the space fell into)

columns.name: WO_COMPLET
columns.description: Indicates the work order is complete or not

columns.name: OPER_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the operational date of the space (this acts as the billing date for invoicing purposes)

columns.name: ADDRESS
columns.description: Indicates the nearest nominal address

columns.name: INTRSXN
columns.description: The nearest intersection to the car share space (this is included for ease of discussion (e.g. this space is at Grove and Ashbury, instead of using a nominal address)

columns.name: CNN_SEG
columns.description: Street segment CNN nearest to the space

columns.name: CNN_INTXN
columns.description: Intersection CNN nearest to the space

columns.name: PODTYPE
columns.description: Whether the space is part of a double or single space pod

columns.name: ZIPCODE
columns.description: The zip code the space falls in

columns.name: NHOOD
columns.description: The space the neighborhood falls in

columns.name: PRICEZONE
columns.description: The pricing zone the space falls in

columns.name: SUPNAME
columns.description: The name of the supervisor representing the district the space is located

columns.name: SUPDSTRICT
columns.description: The supervisor district the space is located

columns.name: GLOBALID
columns.description: System generated unique identifier

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was last processed

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was loaded into the Open Data Portal

columns.name: analysis_neighborhood
columns.description: Neighborhood associated with the midpoint or centroid of the geographic feature
